49 class CollisionGroup
50 {
51 public:
52 
60  CollisionGroup(
61  bool tabulate = true,
62  double min = 300.0, double max = 20000.0, double delta = 100.0) :
63  m_tabulate(tabulate),
64  m_size(0),
65  m_table_min(min), m_table_max(max), m_table_delta(delta)
66  { }
67 
71  template <typename Iterator, typename Provider, typename Params>
72  void manage(
73  Iterator first, Iterator last,
74  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> (Provider::*f)(const Params&),
75  const Params& params)
76  {
77  std::vector< SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> > integrals;
78  while (first != last)
79  integrals.push_back(((*first++).*f)(params));
80  manage(integrals);
81  }
82 
86  void manage(const std::vector< SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> >& integrals);
87 
92  CollisionGroup& update(
93  double T, const Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo);
94 
98  int size() const { return m_size; }
99 
103  const double& operator [] (int i) const { return m_values[i]; }
104 
108  const double& operator () (int i) const { return m_values[i]; }
109 
113  const Eigen::ArrayXd& array() const { return m_values; }
114 
115 private:
116 
118  bool m_tabulate;
119 
121  int m_size;
122 
124  std::vector< SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> > m_integrals;
125 
127  Eigen::ArrayXd m_values;
128  Eigen::ArrayXd m_unique_vals;
129  std::vector<int> m_map;
130 
132  double m_table_min;
133  double m_table_max;
134  double m_table_delta;
135  Eigen::ArrayXXd m_table;
136 };
